RelatedSentence: With almost 30 years of professional experience in the fields of theatre , cinema and multimedia under his belt , director / producer Maurizio Mistretta has designed a workshop for serious students of acting who want to develop their techniques and explore a wider range of approaches to live performance and the creation of original work .

With almost 30 years of professional experience in the fields of theatre , cinema and multimedia under his belt , director / producer Maurizio Mistretta has designed a workshop for serious students of acting who want to develop their techniques and explore a wider range of approaches to live performance and the creation of original work .
Participants will receive training in the classic methodology employed by the ancient Greeks as well as in more modern and contemporary approaches .
Participants will receive training in the classic methodology employed by the ancient Greeks as well as in more modern and contemporary approaches .

These techniques and forms will include physical - based acting , postmodern dance , commedia , clowning , mask work , self - scripting and image - based original theatre , narrative acting , street theatre and methods used by Shakespeare .
The creation and showing of original work are a significant part of the training encouraging participants to develop their own communication skills .
